reference.title: cxxFriendAPIItemLocation
reference.shortdesc: Describes the location of a friend class or function in the C++ source code.

section.title: Description
section.p: Contains child elements showing the filename and line number of the friend class or function.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxFriendAPIItemLocation> <cxxFriendDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="T:/epoc32/include/defect/file_13969.h" /> <cxxFriendDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="14" /> <cxxFriendDefinitionFile name="filePath" value="T:/sf/defect/13969/src/file_13969.cpp" /> <cxxFriendDefinitionFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="4" /> <cxxFriendDefinitionFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="7" /> </cxxFriendAPIItemLocation>
